Description: Available for move-in anytime between August 16 and Sept 1. No Broker fee! . Central A/C. modern kitchen, dishwasher. Elevator in building. Fantastic location as the entire city is at your doorstep. 50 yards to T stop. First and last month rent to move-in for working people. Students pay one month security deposit. No Broker fee! Turn it pays electric. Electric heat. Water included in rent. Please email Mark if you have any questions, to set up a showing, or request a video.
